maqras.text: jeoul-eul gongjeonghage hayeo bujeong eulo tain-ege sonsil-eul kkichiji malla
gyunhyeong-i doedolog mugeleul dalla
salam-ui jeongdanghan gwonlileul bolyu haji malmyeo jisang-e haeag-eul peotteuli ji malla
neohuileul changjohasyeossgo neohui seon jodeul-eul changjohan geubun-eul dulyeowo hala
geudeul-i malhagil nega masul-e geollyeo issnola
neoneun uliwa gat-eun han ingan e bulgwahanola ulineun nega geojis maljang-ila midnola
nega jinsil-ilamyeon haneullobuteouliege beol-eul naelige hayeo bola
geuga daedabhagil naui junim kkeseoneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul asigo gyesinila
geudeul-eun geuleul geoyeoghaess-euni eodum-ui nal-ui beol-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaess nola sillo geugeos-eun widaehan nal-ui beol ieossnola
sillo geuan-eneun yejeung-i iss-eu na geudeul daedasuneun midji anihayeoss deola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
sillo igeos-on man-yuui junim eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-ila
mid-eum-ui seonglyeong-i geugeos-eul ga jigo osieo
geudae ma-eum-e naelieo geugeos-eu lo geudaega gyeong-gojaga doedolog hayeoss eumyeo
myeonglyohan alab-eolo gyesihaessnola
geugeos-eun seonjodeul-ui seongseoe seodo eongeub-i doeeossgeoneul
iseula-el jasondeul-ui hagjadeul i geugeos-i sasil-im-eul algo issneun geos man-eulodo yejung-i doeji anhneunyo
man-il hananim-i bialab-in-e ge gyesihayeo
geugeos-eul geudeul-ege nangsonghaessdeo lado geudeul-eun midji anihaess-eulila
ileohge hananim-eun joeindeul-ui ma-eumsog-edo geugeos-i seumyeodeulge haess jiman
gotongseuleoun beol-eul moggyeoghal ttae kkajineun mid-eulyeo haji anh-eul geos-ila
geubeol-eun geudeul-i alji moshaneun saie gabjagi geudeul-ege dolaehani
geudeul-eun malhalila jeohuiga yu ye doel su eobs-eulkkayo
geudeul-eun ajigdo hananim-ui beol-eul jaechoghago issnola
hananim-i geudeullo hayeogeum su nyeongan hyanglag hadolog han geos-eul geudaeneun aneunyo
yagsogdoen beol-i deudieo geudeul-e ge ileuni
hyeonseeseo jeulgyeossdeon hyanglag-i geu deul-ege yuyonghaji anihadeola
hananim-i gyeong-gojaleul bonaessdeon go-euldeul-eul myeolmangke hayeo
gyohun-i doedolog hayeoss-eudoe u lineun gyeolko geudeul-eul beolham-e budangha ji ani haessnola
satan-i geugeos-eul gajigo o ji ani haess-eumyeo
geugeos-eun geudeul-ege jeoghabha ji anihago geuleohge hal neunglyeogdo eobs nola
geudeul-eun geugeos-eul deudneun gi hoejochado je-oedoeeo iss-eossnola
hananim oee daleun sin-eul sung baehaji balla geuleohji anihamyeon neo huido beol-eul badneun ja jung-e issge doe lila
geudaeui chincheogdeul-ege gyeong-gohala
midneunja jung-eseo geudaeleul ttaleu neun ja-egeneun geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
geudeul-i geudaeege geoyeoghanda myeon illeogalodoe sillo naneun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun il-e chaeg-im-i eobsnola
jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasin bun ege uijihala
geubun-eun yebaehagi wihae hollo seo issneun geudaeleul bogo gyesimyeo
geudaega eopdeulyeo yebaehaneun ja deul jung-e iss-eul ttaedo bogo gyesinani
sillo geubun-eun deul-eusimgwa asim eulo chungmanhasim-ila
illeogalodoe satandeul-i nugu ege naelyeooneunji neohuiege illeojuliyo
geudeul-eun geojishago saaghan modeun jadeul-ege naelyeo ol ppun-ila
geudeul-eun gwileul giul-ina geudeuldaedasuneun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
siindeul-eun saagsog-eseo bang hwanghamyeo geudeul-eul ttaleuneun jadeul-ila
geudeul-i modeun gyegog-eseo iseong-eul ilhgo banghwanghaneun geos-eul neohuineun boji anhhaessneunyo
geudeul-eun geudeul-i haenghajido anihan geos-eul malhago issnola

geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghamyeo hangsang hananim-eul yeom-wonhago baghaeleul bad-eun huedo seuseuloleul bo hohaneun jadeul-eun je-oela saaghan haeng wileul jeojileun jadeul-eun geudeul-i dol-a gal choehuui unmyeong-i mueos-inji alge doenila
